The image shows an art sculpture called: Migratory Soul" created by Josh Keyes, not a real hermit crab using a human skull as a shell.
The artist: Josh Keyes, posted the image on his Facebook page in July 2015 along with a description of the artwork.
The image is part of a series of hermit: based artworks created by the artist, including one featuring a crustacean in a scuba helmet.
The claim is debunked by the expert: s explanation that hermit crabs do use various debris as shells, such as sardine cans, glass bottles, and bottle caps, but not human skulls.
